C#: if (i< 10) {    // condition is true } else if (othercondition) {     // condition is false and othercondition is true} else {     // condition and othercondition are false }
Visual Basic .NET: If condition Then     '  condition is trueElseIf othercondition Then    '  condition is false and othercondition is trueElse    '  condition and othercondition falseEnd If
